entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet clean` (`--all`?) can always fail before a build is run for apps with a `RuntimeIdentifier` #30199
  • .NET 7 Android TrimmerRootDescriptor vs TrimmerRootAssembly #30192

Closed

  • [Loc]With .NET 7 Preview 3 SDK zip installed on local OS, some garbled characters appear when installing wasm-tools for the first time #24757
    7.0.3xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Create the Publish temp folder for Zip deploy if not exist #30201
    Area-WebSDK
  • Update the target framework for the non-restored test projects #30190
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Refactor CSharpSyntaxWrite. Introduce SingleLineStatement, FieldDeclaration, BodyBlock, TypeDeclaration *CSharpSyntaxRewriter. #30141
    Area-GenAPI
  • add named monitor for fixing floating tests #30138
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • [Breaking] `RuntimeIdentifier` No Longer Implies `SelfContained` Apps by Default #30038
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add Visual Basic module template #30139
  • Move Template Discovery Test from dotnet/templating to dotnet/sdk #29628
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Port two better fixes for installer crashes from main #30057
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for new output path format #29599
  • Introduce Dependabot for updating the same dependencies used in dotnet/templating #29921
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Prevent editors from auto-trimming trailing whitespaces in test approval files #30044
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30060
    Area-Infrastructure
